    • mergeArrays

      public static byte[] mergeArrays​(byte[] array1, byte[] array2, int len2)
      Simple method to merge two byte arrays.
      Parameters:
      array1 - First byte array.
      array2 - Second byte array.
      len2 - The length of the second array to copy
      Returns:
      A concatenation of the first and the second arrays.

    • centerAndScale

      public static void centerAndScale​(double[] x)
      Centers and scales the values in x using the mean and standard deviation.
      Parameters:
      x - The array to scale.

    • centerAndScaleColumns

      public static void centerAndScaleColumns​(double[][] x)
      Centers and scales the values in x in column using the mean and standard deviation.
      Parameters:
      x - The matrix to scale.
